name: .PIXIL
summary: Learn about .PIXIL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a PIXIL file with Pixilart. To open a PIXIL file with Pixilart that has been saved on your computer, select FILE â†’ OPEN PIXIL, navigate to the PIXIL file on your computer, then click Open to upload the file to the Pixilart web application.
